0.question:
Ian's teacher had given him an F on a test. Ian knew he would be in trouble. Ian didn't tell his parents about the test. His parents found out from a phone call. Ian got into more trouble.
Which is more likely?
(a) The protagonist would likely try to avoid telling his parents about the bad grade.
(b) The protagonist would likely try to avoid telling his parents about the bad grade so that they wouldn't find out about the F.
0.target_answer: (a) The protagonist would likely try to avoid telling his parents about the bad grade
0.incorrect_answer: (b) The protagonist would likely try to avoid telling his parents about the bad grade so that they wouldn't find out about the F

1.question:
Ben came home after a long day out. He was starving. He approached the cabinet and grabbed the cereal box. There was no cereal after he looked inside of the cereal. His brother confessed that he finished the rest of the bag.
Which is more likely?
(a) Ben would likely consider making himself a sandwich instead.
(b) Ben would likely consider making himself a sandwich instead so that there would be something filling to eat.
1.target_answer: (a) Ben would likely consider making himself a sandwich instead
1.incorrect_answer: (b) Ben would likely consider making himself a sandwich instead so that there would be something filling to eat

2.question:
Jojo wanted to fish while on her vacation at the lake house. She broke off a branch from a nearby tree and stripped it down. Then she tied on some twine she had found along the shore. Finally, she added an unfolded paperclip hook to the end of the twine. Lowering the hook into the water, she immediately caught a shoe.
Which is more likely?
(a) Jojo would try fishing again.
(b) Jojo would try fishing again so that she could catch a fish this time.
2.incorrect_answer: (b) Jojo would try fishing again so that she could catch a fish this time

3.question:
The alcoholism made him very distant. He had to stay focused on other subjects. He wasn't as loving as he used to be. It was as if he was lost in another world. He was finally able to eat again.
Which is more likely?
(a) Seek help for his alcoholism.
(b) Seek help for his alcoholism so that he can repair his relationships and regain his previous level of affection and connection with loved ones.
3.incorrect_answer: (b) Seek help for his alcoholism so that he can repair his relationships and regain his previous level of affection and connection with loved ones

4.question:
Claudia looked under her bed. She hadn't cleaned it in quite a while. She got a mop. She swept underneath the bed. She picked up tons of dust and dirt.
Which is more likely?
(a) Claudia will likely toss the dust and dirt into the trash.
(b) Claudia will likely toss the dust and dirt into the trash so that she can then organize her shoes neatly underneath the bed.
4.target_answer: (a) Claudia will likely toss the dust and dirt into the trash
4.incorrect_answer: (b) Claudia will likely toss the dust and dirt into the trash so that she can then organize her shoes neatly underneath the bed
